channel.title: Webclient ip problem
channel.description: i can logg into my server from my desktop client.. with my normal ip.. then when i logg on webclient it say i connect from 127.0.0.1.. And ive changed my ip and i compiled then jarred&signed then still connects to 127.0.0.1

item.title: Webclient ip problem
item.dc:creator: @kalson744 kalson744
item.description:
@kalson744 wrote:

i can logg into my server from my desktop client… with my normal ip… then when i logg on webclient it say i connect from 127.0.0.1… And ive changed my ip and i compiled then jarred&signed then still connects to 127.0.0.1
